item.title: New biography of Franz Robert Fritz Neumann (1897-1984) aka Ric available
item.author: mail@christianmahnke.de (Christian Mahnke)
item.description:
After the identity of Fritz Neumann and thus Ric could be clarified in October, Mark Strong from Meibohm Fine Arts compiled, condensed and published on AskArt on the basis of the findings from my blog.

Without a paid membership, the full biography can be viewed every Friday, otherwise it is also available for free at Meibohm Fine Arts.

Many thanks to Mark for his work!

item.title: Mastodon
item.author: mail@christianmahnke.de (Christian Mahnke)
item.description:
Even if nothing has happened yet, I can now also be reached as @cmahnke@openbiblio.social via Mastodon.

And since nothing has happened on the Projektemacher Instagram channel for ages, I’ve replaced the link in the footer.

item.title: Instagram
item.author: mail@christianmahnke.de (Christian Mahnke)
item.description: As of today there is an additional Instagram channel. This is just an experiment for now. But what has already annoys me me: There doesn’t seem to be an official and stable API for creating posts / uploading images - very disappointing!

item.title: Labs.projektemache.org gestartet
item.author: mail@christianmahnke.de (Christian Mahnke)
item.description: In order to have a page in the future that can easily break for a few days and to be able to present some things half-finished, there is now the Projektemacher Labs.
